badge.subtitle: Badge component is a compact UI element used to display short, contextual information such as status, labels, or icons, with severity and styling support.
badge.title: Badge

button.subtitle: The Button component is a flexible and customizable button implementation for Vue applications. It supports various properties for styling, behavior, and functionality, making it suitable for different use cases.
button.title: Button

card.subtitle: A versatile container for displaying content in a structured format. It supports slots for custom header, footer, and body content, making it adaptable for various use cases.
card.title: Card

bodyContent.confirmDelete: Are you sure to delete user?

confirmationModal.subtitle: A modal dialog used to prompt users for confirmation before proceeding with an action. Supports customization of header, body, and footer content via slots.
confirmationModal.title: Confirmation modal

data.subtitle: The Data component is a reusable Vue component designed to display a labeled value.
data.title: Data

divider.subtitle: Divider component is a visual separator used to group or divide content with the border line either horizontally or vertically.
divider.title: Divider

dropdown.subtitle: The Dropdown component provides an accessible and customizable menu for selecting actions or options. It supports labels, icons, slots for custom triggers and icons, and emits events on selection.
dropdown.title: Dropdown

gridContainer.subtitle: GridContainer component is a responsive layout wrapper that arranges its child elements in a flexible grid structure.
gridContainer.title: Grid container

loading.subtitle: LoadingPage component is a full-screen overlay loader used to indicate a loading state across the entire page.
loading.title: Loading page

contents.content1: Season sale: Up to 50% off selected items!
contents.content2: New features just launched! Check them out!
contents.content3: New Year, New You: Start fresh with our services!
contents.content4: We value your feedback: take our quick survey!
contents.content5: Warning: Limited time only! Sale ends soon!

message.subtitle: The Message component displays contextual messages with optional icons and a closable action. It supports custom slots, making it flexible for various use cases.
message.title: Message

modal.subtitle: A modal dialog component for displaying content in an overlay with support for custom headers, footers, and dismissal logic.
modal.title: Modal

page.subtitle: Page component is a layout wrapper used to structure pages with a title, subtitle, toolbar, and loading overlay support.
page.title: Page

popup.subtitle: The Popup component is a versatile overlay that displays content relative to a trigger element with automatic or configurable positioning.
popup.title: Popup

sortableList.subtitle: SortableList component is a flexible list that supports drag-and-drop reordering, with support for custom item rendering.
sortableList.title: Sortable list

usage.sortSport: Sort sports from most to least favorite

usage.complete: Are you sure you want to complete the process?

disableTabState.subtitle: By default, tab state is persisted between page refresh and navigations. You can disable this feature by passing :persist-state='false' prop to the component
disableTabState.title: State persistence disabled

tabbed-panel.depreciation-message: {'@'}deprecated: Use TabView component from the ui package instead
tabbed-panel.no-title: Les descendants sans prop `title` seront ignorés
tabbed-panel.title: Tabbed Panel

tooltip.subtitle: The Tooltip component provides contextual information when hovering over an element. It supports various positions, custom styles, and can be triggered by hover or click events.
tooltip.title: Tooltip
